author: Rick
content:
I don't have a Kindle, but I do use the Kindle programs for the Mac and the iPhone app.  I figured it was a halfway house, and as it was free - hey - what's to lose? They're pretty good, in my opinion, although I don't read all that much.

You might want to check out http://freekindlebooks.org/ - lots of links to books from the Project Gutenberg.
